greys_anatomy.author: Boris Gorelik
greys_anatomy.description: A dataset of characters from the TV show Grey's Anatomy. Obtained from ChatGPT. May contain errors.

corporate_directional.author: Boris Gorelik
corporate_directional.description: A dataset of directed corporate collaboration network. Based on private data, anonymized and modified.

corporate_undirected.author: Boris Gorelik
corporate_undirected.description: A dataset of undirected corporate collaboration network. Based on private data, anonymized and modified.

rabbi_quotes.author: Michael Sperling and Michael Satlow
rabbi_quotes.description: A dataset of quotes from rabbis. Obtained from Michael Satlow and Michael Sperling, The Rabbinic Citation Network

pre_wwi_alliances.author: Correlates of War Project
pre_wwi_alliances.description: A dataset of pre-World War I alliances. Based on 'Correlates of war' .

podcasts.author: Boris Gorelik
podcasts.description: A dataset of Hebrew language podcasts. Obtained from podcastindex.org, filtered and processed.

df_node_disambiguation_task.author: Boris Gorelik
df_node_disambiguation_task.description: A dataset of a node disambiguation  task. Based on ca-HepPh data. See generate_node_based_dataset.py for details.

montagna_meetings_edgelist.author: Mael Fabien
montagna_meetings_edgelist.description: A dataset of meetings between members of the Montagna family. Obtained from Mael Fabien, The Montagna Family Network
